solution_line_template: After his mom gives him stuffed animals, Willy has {initial_stuffed_animals} + {mom_gives} = <<{initial_stuffed_animals}+{mom_gives}={after_mom_gives}>>{after_mom_gives} stuffed animals
His dad gives him {after_mom_gives} * {dad_multiplier} = <<{after_mom_gives}*{dad_multiplier}={dad_gives}>>{dad_gives} stuffed animals
In total, Willy has {after_mom_gives} + {dad_gives} = <<{after_mom_gives}+{dad_gives}={total_stuffed_animals}>>{total_stuffed_animals} stuffed animals
